prorate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to calculate a charge, price etc according to the actual amount of service received rather than by a standard sum
prorate.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to calculate a charge, price etc according to the actual amount of service received rather than by a standard sum
prorate.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The agency moved in on the 23rd of the month, so the landlord prorated the rent.
